Description: Faience scarab in grey-white, engraved with a hawk, probably Horus and a uraeus, filled in with linear patterns, one of which appears to be a neb sign.
Bibliographic references: Kenna 1971 / Catalogue of the Cypriote Seals of the Bronze Age in the British Museum (no. 73)
Johnson 1980 / Maroni de Chypre (no. 48, pl. XIII)
Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 281)
